title: BRIEF-GT Capital To Redeem 51% Stake In Property Company Of Friends Inc
text:
BRIEF-GT Capital To Redeem 51% Stake In Property Company Of Friends Inc

Stock Markets 44 minutes ago (Oct 21, 2019 09:40)

BRIEF-GT Capital To Redeem 51% Stake In Property Company Of Friends Inc Oct 21 (Reuters) - GT Capital Holdings Inc :

* EXECUTES DEED OF ASSIGNMENT TO REDEEM 51% STAKE IN

PROPERTY

COMPANY OF FRIENDS IN EXCHANGE FOR 702.44 HECTARES OF SELECT

ASSETS



Source text for Eikon: ID:nPSX6kBVxW

Further company coverage: GTCAP.PS



(Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)

BRIEF-GT Capital To Redeem 51% Stake In Property Company Of Friends Inc
